document_data.name: Granary Workers' Guild of Purskul and Outlying Villages
document_data.mainbody: The '''Granary Workers' Guild of Purskul and Outlying Villages''' was a guild based in the city of [[Purskul]], the Granary City, in [[Amn]] that represented its and the surrounding areas' granary laborers, millers, and bakers in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Granary Workers' Guild operated out of the [[Grainhouse]], an ancient granary on [[Chauntea's Font]] in eastern Purskul. The monumental granary was said to be the oldest structure in town and, after renovation, was used as the guildhall, its offices, and meeting halls.
